hero.title:
Dipak Majumdar
Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I'm a Software Engineer with a passion for building responsive applications where technologies meet creativity

about.title: about
description: I’m a self-taught front-end developer based in Warsaw, Poland. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences.

Transforming my creativity and knowledge into a websites has been my passion for over two years. I have been helping various clients to establish their presence online. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.

items.title: Frontend Developer
items.description: Developing and maintaining web applications using React.js and modern JavaScript. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.

items.title: Full Stack Developer
items.description: Built responsive websites and web applications. Worked with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create engaging user experiences.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.text: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
